content:
The precursor complex [Ni(L)](ClO4)2 was prepared according to the literature procedures previously reported [17].

Preparation of complex

Preparation of [Ni(L)(TPHA)]·8H2O: 5 mL of an aqueous solution of piperidinium terephthalate salt (100.8 mg, 0.3 mmol) was added dropwise to a solution of [Ni(L)](ClO4)2 (153.6 mg, 0.3 mmol) in water (10 mL). The mixture was stirred at 60 °C for 0.5 h. The resulting solution was filtered and kept at room temperature for a few hours to give pink needle crystals suitable for the X-ray structural analysis. Yield: 88 mg (34.6%). Anal. Calcd. for C20H46N6O12Ni: C, 38.66; H, 7.46; N,13.53%. Found: C, 38.69; H, 7.24; N, 13.65%.
clean_text:
The precursor complex [Ni(L)](ClO4)2 was prepared according to the literature procedures previously reported [17].

Preparation of complex

Preparation of [Ni(L)(TPHA)]⋅8H2O: 5 mL of an aqueous solution of piperidinium terephthalate salt (100.8 mg, 0.3 mmol) was added dropwise to a solution of [Ni(L)](ClO4)2 (153.6 mg, 0.3 mmol) in water (10 mL). The mixture was stirred at 60 °C for 0.5 h. The resulting solution was filtered and kept at room temperature for a few hours to give pink needle crystals suitable for the X-ray structural analysis. Yield: 88 mg (34.6%). Anal. Calcd. for C20H46N6O12Ni: C, 38.66; H, 7.46; N,13.53%. Found: C, 38.69; H, 7.24; N, 13.65%.

solution.name: aqueous solution of piperidinium terephthalate salt
